Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: It's budget season and people are eagerly waiting for the Albanese government to take urgent action and prioritize commitments to leave no one behind. The Economic Inclusion Advisory Committee made recommendations that will help entrench people out of poverty. The government is thinking about this while managing fiscal restrictions. There's a lot of talk about the #RaiseTheRate campaign and making child care more accessible enhancing women's safety and boosting paid parental leave. These investments will help drive gender equality which is one of the priorities of the upcoming Budget.
